name: Jerry Jackson
description: I DREAM OF MEETING THAT VERY SPECIAL FEMALE COMPANION; WHO KNOWS AND UNDERSTANDS THAT A TRUE AND WONDERFULLY GREAT RELATIONSHIP REALLY, AND TRUELY DOES, TRAVEL ON A GRAVEL ROAD. A ROAD THAT WE CAN WALK DOWN, TOGETHER ON IN HARMONY. I HONESTLY HOPE THAT I CAN FIND THAT VERY SPECIAL LADY. A VERY CLOSE AND SINCERE FRIENDSHIP IS SIMPLY ALL I AM LOOKING FOR
